column4: Hi I got samba file alpha 4 version in .tar.tar extension how to install/handle it?
you heard me. why would you want samba4 alpha?
I don't  have samba for file sharing isntalled in my ubuntu that's why I downloaded it from internet :)
apt-get give that invalid package etc something like that :(
owh I can't setup phone or modem internet at my ubuntu . every time to test and for errors I boot to ubuntu then I come back at windows for internet :(( ok I will tell of errors later.
that's no reason to install stuff frm source
sudo apt-ger samba    or  apt-get samba?
just I type man samba at terminal?
you type man apt-get or read a manual
or help.ubuntu.com to learn how to install stuff
I don't understand those web sites that's why I come here :-s
find someone else to prechew and handhold you. goodbye
I am sorry I am a simple user and new at ubuntu its hard for me to use commands and etc :) but I am learning day by day and I am sticking always to my ubuntu :d
